I think the ending to this one was not as good of a resolution as the 10,000 BC. I think him continuing with his initial plan of following the future as seen by the Professor would make much more sense because it was the past as seen from that particular future. But now that they affected his timeline, wouldn't it lead to a different future, bringing about some paradoxical circumstances? If we instead saw him follow through with his future and a small epilogue of what happened after he left 2200 AD, that would have been an ending with less chances of having paradoxes. I enjoyed the whole middle part of this work more than 10,000 BC, but the ending was not as fulfilling as 10,000 BC. Both works still top tier in readable hentai, though. Big titties/100
This is a bad ending rigth?

That other story with the cave niggas was fire and I enjoyed reading it so I thought this one would be just as good if not better. I was wrong tho this shit took me like 5 days to read cuz the story just feels all over the place and too random at times. The ending was also whack as hell and didn't leave the same impact as the 10000 bc story. Like man simped for the idol so hard he gave up life as a king for her just to get ghosted, go crazy, try and stab her, and then live the rest of his life as her invisible boyfriend?! Lol wtf
Finally, an isekai plot that's not repetitive.
So creative and fun... The ending is rushed, though.
